snippet: The album, "Red," will feature 16 songs "about the kind of tumultuous, crazy, insane, intense, semi-toxic relationships that I've experienced," Ms. Swift told fans.
abstract: The album, "Red," will feature 16 songs "about the kind of tumultuous, crazy, insane, intense, semi-toxic relationships that I've experienced," Ms. Swift told fans.

headline.print_headline: New Album Coming From Taylor Swift
